parts.text: {"word":"menghasilkan","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"menghasilkan (sesuatu)","english_definition":"to produce, generate, yield, create, or result in something.","examples":[{"sentence":"Pabrik ini menghasilkan ribuan mobil setiap tahun.","translation":"This factory produces thousands of cars every year.","explanation":"This sentence shows the factory producing cars."},{"sentence":"Investasi ini diharapkan menghasilkan keuntungan besar.","translation":"This investment is expected to generate a large profit.","explanation":"This sentence shows the investment generating a profit."},{"sentence":"Kerja kerasnya menghasilkan kesuksesan.","translation":"His hard work resulted in success.","explanation":"This sentence shows hard work resulting in success."}],"collocations":["menghasilkan uang (to make money)","menghasilkan energi (to generate energy)","menghasilkan produk (to produce a product)","menghasilkan ide (to generate an idea)","menghasilkan keuntungan (to generate profit)"],"synonyms":["memproduksi","menciptakan","membuat","mengeluarkan","mendatangkan"],"antonyms":["mengkonsumsi","memakai","menghabiskan"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","intransitive","definition":"menghasilkan (sesuatu)","english_definition":"to result in or yield a certain outcome.","examples":[{"sentence":"Proses ini menghasilkan produk sampingan yang berbahaya.","translation":"This process results in a dangerous byproduct.","explanation":"This sentence shows the process resulting in a byproduct."},{"sentence":"Usaha ini menghasilkan banyak sekali sampah.","translation":"This effort yields a lot of waste.","explanation":"This sentence shows the effort yielding waste."}],"collocations":["menghasilkan sampah (to yield waste)","menghasilkan efek (to produce an effect)","menghasilkan dampak (to generate impact)"],"synonyms":["berakibat","berdampak","menyebabkan"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"Derived from the root word 'hasil' (result, product) with the prefix 'meng-' and suffix '-kan' which indicates a causative action, meaning 'to cause to result' or 'to produce'.","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/mən.ɡɦa.sil.kan/","syllables":"meng-gha-sil-kan"},"inflection":{"notes":"This is a verb form. The root word is 'hasil' (result, product). Other forms can be derived by removing the prefix and suffix or changing them."},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Menghasilkan' is used to describe the act of creating, producing, or generating something, whether tangible or intangible. It can also mean to result in or yield a certain outcome. The context usually clarifies whether it is used transitively (with a direct object) or intransitively (without a direct object).","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Dia menghasilkan uang banyak.","correct":"Dia menghasilkan banyak uang.","explanation":"The correct word order is 'menghasilkan banyak uang' (produces a lot of money) rather than 'menghasilkan uang banyak'."},{"incorrect":"Mesin ini menghasilkan.","correct":"Mesin ini menghasilkan produk.","explanation":"When used transitively, 'menghasilkan' needs a direct object (what is being produced)."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["hasil (result, product)","penghasil (producer)","penghasilan (income, earnings)","hasilnya (the result)"],"compounds":["menghasilkan devisa (to generate foreign exchange)","menghasilkan karya (to produce work)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"frequency_corpus":"High frequency","frequency_google_ngram":"High frequency","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"Intermediate","text":"'Menghasilkan' is a common verb used to describe the act of producing, generating, or yielding something. It is important to understand its transitive and intransitive usage to form correct sentences. Pay attention to the context to determine the meaning and usage."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Perusahaan itu menghasilkan keuntungan besar tahun ini.","translation":"That company generated a large profit this year.","type":"transitive","meaning_category":"Producing Profit"},{"sentence":"Panel surya menghasilkan listrik dari sinar matahari.","translation":"Solar panels generate electricity from sunlight.","type":"transitive","meaning_category":"Generating Electricity"},{"sentence":"Penelitian ini diharapkan menghasilkan solusi untuk masalah tersebut.","translation":"This research is expected to yield a solution to the problem.","type":"transitive","meaning_category":"Yielding a Solution"},{"sentence":"Proses daur ulang ini menghasilkan produk baru yang ramah lingkungan.","translation":"This recycling process produces new environmentally friendly products.","type":"transitive","meaning_category":"Producing New Products"},{"sentence":"Kegiatan ini menghasilkan dampak positif bagi masyarakat.","translation":"This activity yields a positive impact on the community.","type":"intransitive","meaning_category":"Yielding Positive Impact"}]}
